name: vertical-rhythm-reset
description: A Sass/SCSS library for responsive vertical rhythm grids, modular scale typography, and CSS normalization.
author: John Hildenbiddle

scripts.build: npm run build:sass & npm run build:sassdoc
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.watch: npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:sassdoc
scripts.watch:sass: npm run build:sass && npm run build:sass -- -w
scripts.watch:sassdoc: nodemon --watch dist -e scss -x npm run build:sassdoc
scripts.version: npm run prepare && npm run test
